attributes.action: Ban the use of sonic weapons within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In reference to the Mosquito device that has recently been discussed in the news.
It is targeting anyone with good hearing from newborn babies, teenagers & adults

The claims by the inventor and retailers that "The Mosquito is essentially a sounder unit that emits a very high (ultra-sonic) tone that is completely harmless even with long term use" is a complete lie.  Long term exposure to any high decibel sound destroys the ability to hear at that frequency

I submit that:

Firstly it will damage people's hearing at that frequency range no matter what age they are.

Secondly it is a sonic weapon (not ultra-sonic as the inventor claims) and should not be allowed within the UK

Thirdly it is damaging to the environment.

Fourthly it will be useless as people will go deaf to it.

Thankyou for reading this, please sign this petition if you care about our country at all, our children are our future after all, or if you are affected by this.

Such abuse of our own population should be banned

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Mosquito-Ban/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
